local_intent: Perceive the grape, perform precise approach and alignment to it, then verify arrival at the target pose.
assumptions: Grape pose is consistent with prior perception
Robot is already roughly positioned above the grape from the previous step
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase between MoveAbove(grape) and LowerUntilContact in the GLOBAL_BT; uses visibility check for minimal perception and verifies with IsAt.
